item.title: E-voting using Blockchain
item.description: This post will show you how to: create REST API endpoints using the Express framework on Node JS set up a Blockchain for development purposes using Multichain get started on journey develop decentralized application Requirements A local computer Install Node JS Download and install Node JS from their official website: https://nodejs.org/en/. Create an Express application Express is a javascript backend framework for building REST API endpoints.
